description: The type and options related to fs group to use in security context.

ranges.description: The allowed ranges of fs groups. If you would like to force a single fs group then supply a single range with the same `start` and `end`. This is required when `rule` is set to '`MustRunAs`'. Each item in the list must be a supported FS type or '`*`'.

rule.description: The strategy that will dictate what fsGroup is used in the SecurityContext.
